articles.content: Three people received medical treatment during the filming of a Squid Game reality show, Netflix has confirmed, but said claims of serious injury are untrue after a contestant claimed people were str… [+2348 chars]

articles.title: ‘Lost’ photos by Paul McCartney to go on show at National Portrait Gallery - The Guardian
articles.description: Recently rediscovered portraits taken in 60s as Beatles rose to stardom to be focus of exhibition at refurbished NPG
articles.content:
Unseen portraits taken by Paul McCartney in the early 1960s as the Beatles were catapulted to international stardom will go on show at the refurbished National Portrait Gallery in the summer.

articles.description: Christie says he is hopeful for a cure and is determined to carry on making music and touring.
articles.content:
Singer Tony Christie has spoken of his positive approach to life following his dementia diagnosis.
